attributes.title: not what i was expecting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of reliving my preteen years of the annoying orange franchise. However, after a few days of using the app, I realized that it’s a knockoff of the beloved comedy skit. Sure, this app is both orange AND annoying, but it’s not the Annoying Orange™️. I am very disappointed and do not recommend this app to anyone- it is all fake news.

attributes.title: It asked for my number 😳
attributes.review: Sadly I would love this app but it asked for my phone number and idk how I feel about that , no one has everrrrr asked me for my phone number and well an app asking for it makes me depressed knowing an app asks for my number first instead of a girl . I will now file a lawsuit for mental health problems that this app has caused. Thank you - dearly Pinche_juan

attributes.title: Crashed right away
attributes.review: This app messed up my phone so bad like I downloaded it and it tried to open but it kept crashing no matter what so I turned off my phone and tried again and nothing so I even updated my phone and still nothing the app just doesn’t work and isn’t capable of handling its job clearly

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP 🤮
attributes.review:
In the hopes of educating myself I found myself with much more lack of knowledge I started with. It lacks information on many topics and things this man has been saying and doing. It’s almost as if they wanted us not to know. Also I think it would be much better if they highlighted some major events like the tweets that have replaced formal statements.

Xoxo GG

attributes.title: Are you kidding me?
attributes.review: This app literally would not download for like an hour. I wanted to see the plans for Trumps re-election and see how he was planning on changing his campaign. The app crashed my phone multiple times once it started and I basically had to reset my iPhone completely just so I could use it. I think there was a virus in the app.

attributes.title: Icky icky
attributes.review: The worst app ever. This gross hairy orange meatloaf popped up as soon as I opened the app. Then he asked for my phone number but I had a feeling he was taken so I looked it up and he’s MARRIED, where is his ring btw? But GROSS. I’m so unimpressed by this app and the gross guys. I didn’t realize it was just tinder for old men to hit on UNDERAGE girls. 🤮🤮🤢 I won’t be voting for the Cheeto puff and it doesn’t look like his wife wants to either 🧀🌝🐁

ok so look, i’m definitely not part of the gen z community spamming to get this app deleted. therefore i will give an honest review 😌 so i downloaded this app to see our favorite orange’s plan for 🇺🇸𝓪𝓶𝓮𝓻𝓲𝓬𝓪🇺🇸 but like the previous reviews stated, the moment i opened it, it began to brainwash me and all I saw was ✨𝓻𝓪𝓬𝓲𝓼𝓶, 𝓼𝓮𝔁𝓲𝓼𝓶, 𝓪𝓷𝓭 𝓱𝓸𝓶𝓸𝓹𝓱𝓸𝓫𝓲𝓪✨ ik. it’s wild. so unless we get our preside-AHEM i mean *APP* fixed, “it’s a no from me”-simon cowell.

attributes.title: This App SOLD MY INFORMATION
attributes.review: You’d think that T***P would have enough money to not need to SELL MY INFORMATION to ad companies for money but he did. I now am subscribed to 253 dirty websites! Besides the point he did sell my information to google ads and now my bank account is locked. I can’t even let my kids near my phone. Absolute GARBAGE App just use CNN. Or sign some petitions for blm instead ❤️

attributes.title: 💫n o t   t o d a y 💫
attributes.review: i downloaded the app in hopes of helpful information, but instead i just got way to many spamming text messages, that don’t even make sense. the app is hard to navigate, and a mess over all. I am very dissatisfied. this looks like an underfunded app that took 78 seconds to create. once again. america let down. by. an. app. disgraceful. a shame.
